entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING

entry.data:
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 70
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
